recipes.title: Spicy Mexican Rice And Beans
recipes.description: A quick and easy one-pan spicy Mexican rice and beans dish made with white rice, kidney beans, and a blend of smoked chili paste, cumin, and coriander. This vegan and naturally gluten-free recipe is ready in just 30 minutes and brings authentic Mexican flavors to your table.

instructions.text: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then sear in a hot skillet until golden.
Add diced onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Blend tomatoes with chipotle peppers and adobo sauce until smooth.
Pour sauce over chicken, cover and simmer for 25 minutes until tender.
Shred chicken with two forks and mix with the sauce.
Warm tortillas and serve with chicken, crema, and fresh cilantro.

recipes.title: Mexican Rice and Black Beans
recipes.description: A flavorful and aromatic Mexican rice and black beans recipe that is versatile and satisfying. It uses simple ingredients like rice, beans, onion, and spices, cooked together to create a hearty dish suitable as a main or side, ready in about 40 minutes.

instructions.text: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then sear in a hot skillet until golden.
Add diced onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Blend tomatoes with chipotle peppers and adobo sauce until smooth.
Pour sauce over chicken, cover and simmer for 25 minutes until tender.
Shred chicken with two forks and mix with the sauce.
Warm tortillas and serve with chicken, crema, and fresh cilantro.

recipes.title: Mexican Rice With Black Beans And Corn
recipes.description: An authentic and easy stovetop Mexican rice recipe packed with black beans, corn, jalapeño, and spices. This dish is perfect as a side for tacos, fajitas, or enchiladas and takes about 45 minutes to prepare.

instructions.text: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then sear in a hot skillet until golden.
Add diced onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Blend tomatoes with chipotle peppers and adobo sauce until smooth.
Pour sauce over chicken, cover and simmer for 25 minutes until tender.
Shred chicken with two forks and mix with the sauce.
Warm tortillas and serve with chicken, crema, and fresh cilantro.

recipes.title: Jollof Rice
recipes.description: A classic West African one-pot rice dish made with rice, tomatoes, onions, and spices. This halal-friendly recipe is a staple in West African cuisine, known for its rich, smoky flavor and vibrant color, and can be prepared in about 40 minutes.

instructions.text: Season chicken with salt, pepper, and curry powder. Brown in oil until golden.
Remove chicken and sauté diced onions and bell peppers until soft.
Add tomato paste and cook for 2 minutes until darkened.
Add rice, stirring to coat with the tomato mixture.
Pour in hot chicken stock, add scotch bonnet pepper whole.
Return chicken to pot, cover and simmer for 20 minutes until rice is tender.
